mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO, DEPT_NO AS BATIS_DEPT_NO, POS_NO AS BATIS_POS_NO, EMP_NAME, EMP_GENDER, EMP_PHONE, EMP_SAL, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_HIREDATE, EMP_RETDATE, EMP_SSC, EMP_DEGREE, EMP_CAREER, EMP_PWD, EMP_PHOTO, EMP_MIL FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NO = #{value}

SELECT e.*, eh.ISSUED_CONTENT, d.DEPT_NAME, p.POS_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE e, EMP_HISTORY eh, DEPARTMENT d, POSITION p WHERE e.EMP_NO = eh.EMP_NO AND e.DEPT_NO = d.DEPT_NO AND e.POS_NO = p.POS_NO AND e.EMP_RETDATE IS NOT NULL AND eh.ISSUED_ORDER = '퇴사' AND e.EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT ew.WORK_START, ew.WORK_END, ew.WORK_TYPE FROM EMP_WORKINGHOUR ew WHERE ew.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND ew.WORK_START BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startdate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{enddate}, 'YYYYMMDD') OR ew.WORK_END BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startdate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{enddate}, 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT SUM((e.WORK_END - s.WORK_START) *24 * 60 * 60) FROM ( SELECT * FROM EMP_WORKINGHOUR ew WHERE WORK_START BETWEEN (SELECT trunc(sysdate, 'iw') FROM dual) AND (SELECT trunc(sysdate, 'iw')+ 7 FROM dual) AND WORK_TYPE = '출근' ) s, ( SELECT * FROM EMP_WORKINGHOUR ew WHERE WORK_END BETWEEN (SELECT trunc(sysdate, 'iw') FROM dual) AND (SELECT trunc(sysdate, 'iw')+ 7 FROM dual) AND WORK_TYPE = '퇴근' ) e WHERE TO_CHAR(e.WORK_END, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(s.WORK_START, 'YY/MM/DD') AND s.EMP_NO = #{empNo}
